entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
